article_title: Allow Refugees in, Screen for Terrorists
article_text:
You May Also Like

The far majority of Democrats think the party will join together after this summer's national convention following a con . . .

Former House Speaker Newt Gingrich lauded Donald Trump on Twitter Thursday for sealing the delegates needed to win the R . . .

article_metadata.news_keywords: john kasich, syrian refugees, syria, screen, terrorists

og.description: GOP presidential candidate and Ohio Gov. John Kasich wants to allow Syrian refugees into the United States, but only after carefully screening out any potential terrorists.
